column4: <fritz> can any1 assist me in a problem?...i want to install gizmo 2 be able 2 make calls on messenger...i donwloaded the files onto my desktop...now what....how do i make adept see them?
amsn is in the repositories which allows voice calls...
no amsn is just for msn.... sorry i misread you're question
didn't realise you meant yahoo instead of msn
